Chronic eustachian tube dysfunction.context:
Preoperative Diagnoses:
1. Chronic eustachian tube dysfunction.   2. Retained right pressure equalization tube.   3. Retracted left tympanic membrane.   4. Dizziness.

98-year-old female.context: This is a 98-year-old female whom I have known for several years.

conductive loss.context: With the additional conductive loss secondary to the retraction of the tympanic membrane, her hearing aid and function deteriorated significantly.

retraction of the tympanic membrane.context: With the additional conductive loss secondary to the retraction of the tympanic membrane, her hearing aid and function deteriorated significantly.

deteriorated significantly.context: With the additional conductive loss secondary to the retraction of the tympanic membrane, her hearing aid and function deteriorated significantly.

small ear canals.context: The major problem is that she has got small ear canals and a very sensitive external auditory canal; therefore it cannot tolerate even the wax cleaning in the clinic awake.

sensitive external auditory canal.context: The major problem is that she has got small ear canals and a very sensitive external auditory canal; therefore it cannot tolerate even the wax cleaning in the clinic awake.

cerumen.context: On the right side, we removed the old tube and then cleaned the cerumen and found that it was larger than the side of the tube in perfection or perforation in tympanic membrane in the anterior inferior quadrant.

perforation in tympanic membrane.context: On the right side, we removed the old tube and then cleaned the cerumen and found that it was larger than the side of the tube in perfection or perforation in tympanic membrane in the anterior inferior quadrant.

ciprofloxacin eyedrops.context: Three drops of ciprofloxacin eyedrops was placed in the ear canal.

tympanic membrane adhered.context: On the left side, the tympanic membrane adhered and it was retracted and has some myringosclerosis.

retracted.context: On the left side, the tympanic membrane adhered and it was retracted and has some myringosclerosis.
